website_summaries.verdict: This flat-free option is made from a polyurethane foam, which still has a good carrying capacity.
pros: Solid and very dense polyurethane foam tire
Does not need to be inflated
Works very well for wheelbarrow jobs around the yard
Durable and good quality on the construction of this tire
cons: A little heavier weight than a standard wheelbarrow tire which adds a bit to your load

customer_reviews.title: great replacement for the tubless airfilled tire that does not stay inflated!
customer_reviews.text: After running around to 2-3 gas stations to refill the tubeless air-filled tire on my wheelbarrow from Home Depot, and using a bicycle pump it still will not stay inflated. Well, can't find such a replacement tire locally at Home Depot or Ace Hardware, so decided best option is to try this one. Arrived earlier than promised in packaging undamaged. Easy to install onto old wheelbarrow axel, just had to cut the old plastic tube bushing in half so the tire will fit in middle of the axel rod. It will works doing minor hauling for my garden- moving pine straw bales, bags of mulch, soil, pine bark, that kind of stuff. Pleased with this product
customer_reviews.author: Andrea J. Kippels

customer_reviews.title: No flats, but harder to push
customer_reviews.text: No more flat tires, but you'll be surprised how much more effort is required to move across the same surface compared to a pneumatic tire
customer_reviews.author: W. A. Henn

customer_reviews.title: Cool color, nice no-flat technology.
customer_reviews.text: I love this wheel. I was afraid it wouldn't fit my wheelbarrow - since I bought it without measuring first. But diameter-wise, it was fine. The part at the center where the rod goes through to attach to the wheelbarrow came out much further than what I had before. However, the spacers on my wheelbarrow were hard plastic, so I just sawed them down to the length they needed to be, and voila! I love that this won't ever need to be pumped up, and it does bounce like a pneumatic tire. It's nice! This looks sharp with my hunter green wheelbarrow, too!
customer_reviews.author: Jagroo

customer_reviews.title: No more pumping up the tire before using my wheelbarrow :)
customer_reviews.text: Love this flat free tire... My old wheelbarrow has had a slow leak for a couple years. I did have to modify things on my wheelbarrow so that this new tires hub would fit, but the measurements listed in listings images were plenty for me to make sure it would work (plan ahead carefully for whatever project you may need this wheel for). I love not having to pump up the tire on my wheelbarrow before using it. These are a bit heavier than a standard tubed tire, but to me this is well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Doc RH

customer_reviews.title: Good for a wheelbarrow but not heavy loads on small trailers.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this tire for my small trailer I haul wood in. It lasted less then a year before the rim started cutting into the foam tire because of the weight. I figured it could hold as much weight as the air tire on the other side but that’s not the case. Disappointed that it is falling apart so soon. Do not use for high weight applications.
customer_reviews.author: Mike B.

customer_reviews.title: Good tires, mismatched dye lot.
customer_reviews.text: Good, solid product, easy to install, just sucks that die lot not the same for both tires. Both are yellow, bought at the same time, but ok ne is slightly more saturated in color (more orange) while the other is paler (more green). Husband is NOT uninstalling as he says the function fine. I guess we're stuck with janky looking tires though i was going for a more color blocked look.
customer_reviews.author: JtotheB

customer_reviews.title: They are little, yellow, different.
customer_reviews.text: Dump carts and wheelbarrows get plenty of use in my yard and invariably developed leaks time and again. I'm done with that. These wheels work because they are round. Given their size, they're not heavy at all for being solid. The downside is that they're that bright yellow. Inflating them takes no time at all! (Duh)
customer_reviews.author: Ploon

customer_reviews.title: dependability
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm! No more worrying about that darn tire being inflated to the right pressure, or having to fix it. I've used it over capacity a couple times hauling quickrete, and it does the job!! I even stored it for a week with a load in it, and the tire retained it's shape. My wheelbarrow is now more of a go-to than a last-resort tool.
customer_reviews.author: Peter B

customer_reviews.title: It works well for me.
customer_reviews.text: Works well so far. No more tire to air up. Handled moving large loads of dirt, river rock, and stones. Only thing I've noticed is there isn't the helpful bounce of pneumatic tires to aid in getting over some things, but I'll take that over having to air a tire up when I need to us my wheel barrow
customer_reviews.author: Boba Fett

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised, but...
customer_reviews.text: The hub on these stick out so far that I had to replace the regular spacers on the wheelbarrow with washers. Check that the hubs are not going to cause you problems before buying. You might want to buy some plastic spacers of appropriate size to make them fit.
customer_reviews.author: EricB

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I never understood why a wheelbarrow had to have tire that needed to be pumped. I'm so glad that there is no flat tire like this. Was easy to replace and now I dont have to worry about it going flat
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good tire
customer_reviews.text: This works great on my true temper wheelbarrow from lowes. It is holding up so far. Only thing I don't like is the color. I think I had to trim my plastic spacers a little, but that's easy with pvc cutters or hacksaw.
customer_reviews.author: michael johnston

customer_reviews.title: Super tire.  Hopefully it will last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.text: I love this tire. It will be interesting to see how it works over time. Currently using my Wheelbarrow to relocate snow. Works well in colder temperatures. Check sizing of hub. It just fit on my wheelbarrow with the help of WD40. I love that it is yellow. No confusing to who owns that wheelbarrow.
customer_reviews.author: maggier

customer_reviews.title: Good product meets expectations.
customer_reviews.text: Very good product fits my True temper wheel barrow perfectlly . I will probably use it another 20 years , if I live that long!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gustavo Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Airless replacement tire for my wheelbarrow
customer_reviews.text: I used this as a replacement to an original air-filled tire on my wheelbarrow. Fits like a glove.
customer_reviews.author: LesterT

customer_reviews.title: I have used these on a garden cart for the ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used these on a garden cart for the past spring and summer season. They have held their shape very well under moderate loads (no more than 80 lbs). I have had no flat spots after the cart has sat for long periods and they hold up well in the heat and cold.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wroks great
customer_reviews.text: No more flats was considering buying a new wheelbarrow this thing fixed my issues
customer_reviews.author: R. Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Tired of pumping up a wheel.
customer_reviews.text: Now pumping does not need to do anything, this wheel will work for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Measure twice buy once.
customer_reviews.text: The way I measured the hub cylinder width was off (smaller) then my other tire I replaced. I slid pvc pipe on both sides of the axil to center. Need to read and measure carefully!!! I felt I had better instructions on how to measure on the shipped box then before when I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Better than inflatable
customer_reviews.text: I’ve got a yard full of goat head weed which destroys inflatable tires. Added this to a wheelbarrow and it’s working well so far.
customer_reviews.author: chris & mairi

customer_reviews.title: No more flat tires
customer_reviews.text: Installed easy and idon't need to worry about flat tires ever again
customer_reviews.author: Anthony s

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install. The durability is very good. Never will I have to worry about a flat again.
customer_reviews.author: Vinnie

customer_reviews.title: Brings pizzazz to yard work
customer_reviews.text: The most exciting equipment wheel out there - I get constant comments from other homeowners on my exciting fashion choice of wheel. The wheel works perfectly fine, and no flats.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey D. Foss

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Excellent replacement for a flat wheel barrow tire. Went on easy and is holding up well. We have used it to move heavy bags of garden soil around the house to new raised beds.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret R.

customer_reviews.title: great wheelbarrow wheel
customer_reviews.text: great wheel! so glad to find this for much less than I had paid for a pneumatic tire that did not hold up! I recommend this wheel!
customer_reviews.author: Joanne E. Hesser

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be a good one. I love the idea of not having ...
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what all I can say about a yellow wheel barrow tire. Seems to be a good one. I love the idea of not having to put air in the tire every time I decide to use the wheel barrow. Thank you for offering this product.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Better than having to fill tires
customer_reviews.text: My husband made fun of me for buying bright yellow tires, but my wheelbarrow is yellow and I like color in the garden.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Grace

customer_reviews.title: Nice Tire!
customer_reviews.text: Just started using it and it works great. I had to cut the spacers to fit my wheelbarrow but once it was on it did great. Nice to know it won't go flat!
customer_reviews.author: John Durham

customer_reviews.title: Good tire
customer_reviews.text: Had to make use of the old sleeves to get to work but it works great
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Great. Just what I expected and received in a ...
customer_reviews.text: Great. Just what I expected and received in a timely fashion. Quite happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed to replace a tube tire on my wheelbarrow. It is ridiculous to try to use a wheelbarrow with a weak tire. This unit fit perfectly with some minor adjustment to the original bushings.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Emmert

customer_reviews.title: It works GREAT now that I have it put on
customer_reviews.text: The hub is narrower than the one I took off so I had to make two 1/2" bushings, No problem but not expected. It works GREAT now that I have it put on.
customer_reviews.author: Steve A. Edge

customer_reviews.title: Not a quality product
customer_reviews.text: first time wheel was used on Jackson wheel barrel, load "shifted" on the slope we were crossing and center hub of the tire bent. The wheel is now out of round and wobbles, it is unusable. not worth the money at half the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Center too small for axle
customer_reviews.text: Tires look great, can't use on cart because center is too small for axle. Kept them for future use on chicken tractor
customer_reviews.author: ELF Studios

customer_reviews.title: Great reliable tire!
customer_reviews.text: This is great! I never used my wheel barrel so much, now that I don't have to pump up the old tire. Even my gardener uses it. I told him to get one on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: This tire is great, we have used it most every day. Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: M J Stew

customer_reviews.title: Buy me!
customer_reviews.text: My other air filled tire kept going flat and could not withstand heavy loads. I have been moving rock with this and it’s great
customer_reviews.author: Shanna K

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: I had to make some adjustments to fit my standard wheel barrel. It is a little soft under heavy loads which causes it to move less easily.
customer_reviews.author: P. Marino

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got tired of replacing the tube in my wheel barrow. This is exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.author: Derek B.

customer_reviews.title: Flat-Free tire
customer_reviews.text: Received my new flat=free tire for my wheel barrow...it's colorful and a great bargain...
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia D Burchard

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: All good, even had bushings for side play. Fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Ted Johnson

customer_reviews.title: ... past Memorial holiday for mulch and stone work and love it!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this since the past Memorial holiday for mulch and stone work and love it!! It's so ugly but that's what makes it so good
customer_reviews.author: Rengi

customer_reviews.title: I am so glad I never have to change the tube on my ...
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I never have to change the tube on my wheelbarrow tire ever again! The hub comes with a hard nylon spacer which I cut shorter with a hack saw to fit my axle. No problem at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mona Tidwell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit fine on my RZT50 0 Turn Mower. Now my Mower turns much better
customer_reviews.author: Charles Bieber

customer_reviews.title: Well built!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Seems to be a great, reliable replacement wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Edward T Walker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great no longer have to check air pressure on wheel barrow
customer_reviews.author: Rod

customer_reviews.title: No more flats.
customer_reviews.text: Easy installation. No more surprises when I go to use my wheelbarrow.
customer_reviews.author: Lightning Rod

customer_reviews.title: Good wheel
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Only had to cut a bushing to fit the wheel. Otherwise, am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Sterling J. Crabtree

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: They were shipped fast and just what I need. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Rhett W

customer_reviews.title: work well
customer_reviews.text: fit well but squeaky they make a lot of noise when loaded
customer_reviews.author: Valley

customer_reviews.title: No grease fitting as shown in pictures.
customer_reviews.text: The pictures show a grease fitting on the hub. I purchased 4 and they do not have a grease fitting.
customer_reviews.author: Greg H

customer_reviews.title: Like most others who bought it
customer_reviews.text: Like most others who bought it, I had to cut down the bushings to make it fit. It is a very heavy wheel and when you are already wheeling heavy loads up steep hills the extra weight is noticeable. Also, unlike an inflatable tube, there isn't as much give in the tire so when it is a bit rougher to wheel it over uneven surfaces, like tree roots and tree branches. If you're working on a flat surface, this is a great tire. For working in the woods, no so much.
customer_reviews.author: RayBlehar

customer_reviews.title: Get Rid of That Old Air Filled Tire
customer_reviews.text: This was my first flat free wheel. I purchased it for my old wheelbarrow when I became tired of inflating the tire over and over again. This tire went right on the existing axle and was easy to install. I have used it for light and heavy loads and it has the same feel as the air filled tire.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Ruckterstuhl

customer_reviews.title: No more flats!
customer_reviews.text: Great new tire for my old wheelbarrow. Takes a heavy load and doesn't squish down. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: N. Heil

product_meta.title: Kunhua 14-pu-y-sz-16 4.00-6-inch Flat Free Wheelbarrow Wheel Wheelbarrow Tire- 4.5-inch Centered Hub(Two Sides Symmetrical) - 5/8-inch Ball Bearings - 13-inch Tire Diameter
product_meta.description:
The Kunhua Machinery 13-inch flat-free wheelbarrow tire provides the bounce and feel of air tires with the benefit of no flats. 
Perfect for contractors and residential users with small wheelbarrows and carts,this tire is rated to 400 pounds. 
Mounted on a heavy-duty steel rim with high performance bearing.The diameter measures 13 inches.
feature_bullets: Flat Free Tire made of solid polyurethane foam,don't have to inflate it
Providing the bounce and load handling characteristics similar to an air-filled tire with the benefit of never going flat
4.00-6" Tire;13" Tire Diameter;3.5" Tire Width;4.5" Centered Hub(two sides symmetrical);5/8" Ball Bearings

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars119 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
